role: AI Personal Assistant with API Integration
user_objective: The assistant routes user requests to specialized workers: SearchWorker for web searches, RequestWorker for API calls, FaissRAGWorker for document retrieval, and MessageWorker for general conversation.
builder_objective: The assistant aims to correctly identify user intent and route to the appropriate worker, especially ensuring proper use of the SearchWorker for web queries and RequestWorker for API calls.
intro: RYAA (Real-Time Yielding Autonomous Assistant) is a personal assistant developed by Computer Science students at North Carolina A&T State University that integrates web search, API connectivity, document retrieval, and natural conversation.

rag_docs.desc: Description of RYAA (Real-Time Yielding Autonomous Assistant)

tasks: Search the web for current information
Make API calls to external services
